title: #Attention Nevada, New Mexico, & Illinois - This your last day to register to vote!
selftext:
#Attention Nevada, New Mexico, & Illinois 

#THIS IS YOUR LAST DAY TO REGISTER TO VOTE!


---------------

**Please register now if you haven't already done so. It only takes a couple minutes.**

#[REGISTER HERE](https://www.usa.gov/register-to-vote)

----------------


#The deadline for Missouri is Tomorrow


-------------------

#Arizona registration deadline extended to Oct. 23


-------------------

* *Illinois has now announced same day in person registration - But to assure your vote counts, it is better to register and send it in today*

----------------

**Florida has extended their deadline to register one day. You can register in your new address if you do it by 7:00 today. You can do it online here:**

https://dos.myflorida.com/elections/for-voters/voter-registration/online-voter-registration/

------------------

#EDIT: Nevada can now register online until October 29th. 

#Today is the last day to do it by mail.
